content: l wood a k a mage wood whimsies please do not distribute this pattern yourself and please do remember to give credit to me as the designer of the pattern when posting or selling your work made with this pattern online as i so look forward to seeing your creations on instagram and other social media you can use pattern by @magewoodwhimsies and/or #magewoodwhimsies so that i can see your work thank you so much for downloading my pattern © maggie l wood © mage wood whimsies 6 here are some further pictures of toads in their witch or wizard hats and capes © maggie l wood © mage wood whimsies 7
